entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 58 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
